aircraft.value: Stormbird Attack - AC-2079-336 at Regional Depot-A

defect_observed.value: Battery thermal runaway indication. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Power Distribution component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 07/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 08/12/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 11/12/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 10/12/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 13/12/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh
